node.name: FAB Defense AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip
node.short_description: The AG-43 State-of-the-Art Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense enhances grip control, reduces slipping and wrist fatigue, improving overall control during firing sequences.
node.description:
The AG-43 State-of-the-Art Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense enhances grip control, reduces slipping and wrist fatigue, improving overall control during firing sequences.

 

AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip Advantages:

Ergonomic non-slip design
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip
Extended beavertail enables higher, firmer hold, for superior weapon handling
Readily accessible storage compartment with tight-sealing hinged door

 

AG43 Tactical Pistol Grip Compatibility:

M-16 / SR-25 / AR-10 / AR-15 Variants

node.name: FAB Defense AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip
node.short_description: The AG-47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip from FAB Defense provides enhanced grip and improved weapon handling for your AK-47/74.
node.description:
The AG-47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip from FAB Defense provides enhanced grip and improved weapon handling for your AK-47/74.

 

AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip Advantages:

Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
Improves trigger operation
Built-In storage compartment with removable 2x CR123 battery holder
Made of MIL-SPEC fiberglass reinforced polymer composite
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip

 

AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip Compatibility:

AK-47/74, AKS-74U 'Krinkov', Galil Models

node.name: FAB Defense AGR43 Tactical Pistol Grip
node.short_description: The AGR-43 Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense is the latest in a line of pistol grips featuring multi-textured rubber, enhancing your grip experience.
node.description:
The AGR-43 Tactical Pistol Grip from FAB Defense is the latest in a line of pistol grips featuring multi-textured rubber, enhancing your grip experience.

Incorporated into its design, is the superior contour of its predecessor, adding even more comfort and proper ventilation needed in extreme heat and moist environments, giving you the edge you need in the field or at the range.

 

AGR43 Tactical Pistol Grip Advantages:

MIL-SPEC reinforced polymer composite with multi-textured rubber overmould superior coating
Three different overmould rubber textures; rib studded at palm, alligator pattern for front fingers and moon surface textured sides
Multi textured rubber provides superior ventilation, prevents slip and reduces sweaty palms
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip
Extended beavertail for better control, allowing a higher firmer hold
Readily accessible storage area with securely sealed hinged door

 

AGR43 Tactical Pistol Grip Compatibility:

M-16 / SR-25 / AR-15 variants

node.name: FAB Defense Advanced Mag-Well Grip
node.short_description: The Advanced Mag-Well Grip has a system of easily replaceable grips. The Tactical grip can be used while performing drills on the range, and then quickly replaced with a Mask grip.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Advance Mag-Well Grip is the latest evolution of FAB-Defense' bestselling product, the MWG.

The Advanced Mag Well Grip is the first product developed with the recreational shooter in mind, like its predecessor, the grip transforms the standard AR Magwell into a comfortable and ergonomic foregrip with a flared and extended magazine well that enhances reload speed while adding an ornamental aspect to the firearm.

The Advanced Mag-Well Grip has a system of easily replaceable grips; the Tactical grip can be used while performing drills on the range, and then quickly replaced with a Mask grip, according to personal preferences.

 

Advanced Mag Well Grip Advantages:

Replaceable grip area (Comes standard with the Tactical grip and one Mask grip)
Functions as a flared and extended magazine well, enhances reload speed under stress
Quick and easy installation, no gunsmith required
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction

 

Advanced Mag Well Grip Compatibility:

M16 5.56x45 lower receiver variants, without a flared magazine well.
May not work well with the PMAG GEN3

node.name: FAB Defense FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip
node.short_description: The FAB Defense FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip enables an additional ‘horizontal to vertical’ grip option on your weapon, enhancing tactical versatility and performance.
node.description:
The FAB Defense FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip enables an additional 'horizontal to vertical' grip option on your weapon, enhancing tactical versatility and performance.

 

FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip Advantages:

Specifically designed not to interfere with handgun firing when in horizontal position
Quickly transforms from a horizontal grip to a vertical grip
Easy and fast adapt/removal mechanism

 

FGG-S Tactical Folding Foregrip Compatibility:

1913 MIL-STD picatinny rails
Most handguns with underside accessory rail

node.name: FAB Defense Mag Well Grip
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Mag Well Grip transforms the magazine well into a comfortable, close ergonomic foregrip for enhanced manoeuvrability and lower signature of operator in CQB.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Mag Well Grip transforms the magazine well into a comfortable, close ergonomic foregrip for enhanced manoeuvrability and lower signature of operator in CQB.

Combined with a magazine funnel for easier, faster, more reliable magazine change.

 

Mag Well Grip Advantages:

Provides a tight and close hold for speed and manoeuvrability in CQB
Prevents pressure on the magazine, reduce feeding-related malfunctions
Functions as a flared and extended magazine well and enhances reload speed. Allows yout to keep eye contact with the target during reload.
Quick and easy installation, no gunsmith required
Incorporates a serial number window
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction

 

Mag Well Grip Compatibility:

M16 5.56x45 lower receiver variants, without a flared magazine well.
The MWG is not compatible with PMAG-GEN3

node.name: FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonomic Grip Combo
node.short_description: The FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonomic Grip Combo combines a pointing foregrip with an additional thumb lock for secure grip and increased handling.
node.description:
The FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonomic Grip Combo is a unique combination of a pointing foregrip, for ideal posture, with an additional thumb lock for secure grip and increased handling.

 

FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonimic Grip Combo Features:

Provides natural grip positioning for point and shoot techniques
Ergonomic design prevents fatigue and Increase long term accuracy
Unique pointing grip and thumb lock combination for secure grip
Improves weapon handling and maneuverability
Maintains natural body stance
Allows versatile positioning for optimal user compatibility
Made of a single piece of extremely durable polymer composite
Provides an additional compartment for cleaning kit or spare battery

 

Included in the kit:

PTK – Ergonomic pointing grip
VTS – Versatile Tactical Support

 

Compatibility:

Under and side 1913 MIL-STD picatinny rails

node.name: FAB Defense Rubberised Ergonomic Foregrip
node.short_description: The new State–of-the-Art FAB Defense Rubberised, Ergonomically Designed, Tactical Foregrip.
node.description:
The new State–of-the-Art FAB Defense Rubberised, Ergonomically Designed, Tactical Foregrip.

 

FAB Defense Rubberised Ergonomic Foregrip Advantages:

Unique Comfortable Texture and Sleek Contour for Superior Hold
Compact Non-Slip Design for Use With or Without Gloves
Enhances Overall Tactical Versatility,1913 Picatinny Compatible
Convenient Waterproof Storage Compartment for Batteries, Cleaning Kits, etc.
Secure Mount with Durable QD Bolt Locking
Made with High-Quality Latex and Reinforced Polymer Composite Material

node.name: FAB Defense Tactical Folding Grip
node.short_description: The T-FL 7 Positions Vertically Folding Tactical Foregrip quickly transforms from a horizontal grip into a vertical grip at the push of a button and provides enhanced versatility, grip and functionality.
node.description:
The T-FL 7 Positions Vertically Folding Tactical Foregrip quickly transforms from a horizontal grip into a vertical grip at the push of a button and provides enhanced versatility, grip and functionality.

 

FAB Defense Tactical Folding Grip Advantages:

Easy to fit and secure – slides on the rail and secured with two bolts
Compact foregrip folds to any of seven angles
Enhances natural fighting stance and hold on your rifle
Incorporates a convenient waterproof storage compartment
Improved reaction, on-target time, and muzzle control during close combat
MIL-SPEC fiberglass reinforced polymer composite

 

Tactical Folding Grip Compatibility:

All 1913 Picatinny or weaver rails (Min' 60mm long)

node.name: FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support
node.short_description: The VTS Versatile Tactical Support from FAB Defense provides a large variety of solutions for forward grip positioning, enhancing comfort and increasing accuracy.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support provides a large variety of solutions for forward grip positioning, enhancing comfort and increasing accuracy.

This ergonomic support can be set in multiple locations for a wide variety of tactical needs and ideal operational superiority, taking in mind ideal compact configuration.

 

FAB Defense Versatile Tactical Support Advantages:

Allows Optimal Personal Configuration of Your Rifle
Fits on All 1913 Picatinny Rails
Improves Weapon Control and Ergonomics
Permits Safe and Efficient use in Extreme Operational Scenarios
Can be used Complimentary to the PTK as a Thumb Support

 

Versatile Tactical Support Compatibility:

Fits on All 1913 MIL-STD Picatinny rails

node.name: Form Pistol Grip for Chiappa Rhino LH -Black Laminte
node.short_description: Customise your Chiappa Pistol with these target grips from Form Rifle stocks.
node.description:
You can now customise your Chiappa Chiappa Rhino with target pistol grips from Form Rifle stocks. This is LH variant.

Chiappa Rhino Pistol Grip Features:

Highly ergonomic target grip
Available in right-hand and left-hand versions
Outstanding oil finish
CNC machined for a perfect fit
Supplied with fitting spanner for the UK spec LBR
